attributes.action: Remove the public subsidy from the RSC unless they prevent reselling of their tickets on Ebay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As the Royal Shakespeare Company (RSC) receives 85% of it's public funding from Taxation, it should be doing all it can to prevent £40 face value tickets being sold for £500 on Ebay. Or should press charges to recoup the resellers profits.

More money is made by private individuals illegally re-selling RSC tickets (for Hamlet, David Tennant production, etc) on ebay, than the RSC actually makes themselves from selling them originally.

therefore unless the RSC does more to prevent this, the public funding should be stopped.
